title: Daily Care
items: Wash lashes daily with an oil-free cleanser.
Gently brush your lashes with a spoolie.

title: Things to Avoid
items: Avoid steam, saunas, and excessive heat for 24-48 hours.
Do not use oil-based makeup or removers.
Avoid mascara and mechanical lash curlers.
Refrain from rubbing or pulling on your extensions.

title: Maintenance
items: Schedule fills every 2-3 weeks to maintain fullness.
Sleep on your back or use a silk pillowcase.
Contact us if you experience any irritation.
